__TOC__

=== Status ===
Running 9.04 on Thinkpads T43, T41 and T23.

=== Ubuntu on Thinkpad links ===
* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=745146|Xorg.conf for a T41 (3d enabled and super fast) - 7500 Mobility]]</nowiki>

=== Configurations ===

==== strongbad (T43) ====
* Thinkpad T43 <nowiki>[[http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/2669-B77|2669-B77]]</nowiki>
* 1.5GB (1GB+512MB)
* Hibernate works out of the box (no problems after wakeup, sound etc. seems fine)
* Wifi works out of the box (much stronger signal than T41, and light years ahead of the T23)
* Battery life ~3hrs (6 cell)

==== jupiter (T41) ====
* aka tanis (Windows XP)
* Thinkpad T41 <nowiki>[[http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/2373-7FM|2373-7FM]]</nowiki>
* 1.5GB (1GB+512MB)
* Battery life ~4hrs (9 cell)

==== wario (T23) ====
* Thinkpad T23 <nowiki>[[http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/Category:T23|2648-4MA]]</nowiki>
* 640MB RAM (512MB+128MB)
* Battery life now about 15 minutes...
